snippet.title: Panorama Cotton - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
🔮 Something magical has arrived! 🔮 
In Panorama Cotton, fly and shoot your way through colorful stages, in pseudo-3D rail shooter style, straight from the 90s! Cotton and Silk head off to stop evildoers once more, in this beautiful throwback. 🌈 🌈 Newly resurrected magical adventures for your Nintendo Switch & PS4, available digitally, right now!


For more info, check out: https://www.iningames.com/games/panorama-cotton/
